entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:46 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 2:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.3°C
Wind: WNW 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
